name: Spirit Gorgons . Whisper of the Sands
description:
A lone figure cloaked in midnight rises softly from the sands,
her black mantle stirred by the restless wind.
Ancient stones stand as silent witnesses to her awakening —
a moment suspended between earth’s embrace and sky’s breath.
This 1/1 NFT from the “Rebirth of the Gorgona” series captures the quiet power of transformation and the eternal dance of the elements.
